name: Lincoln 5, Sci-Fi Mystery game for iPhone
blurb: Every single person on the USS Gateway Space Station is dead; except for you. Can you solve the mystery before you meet the same fate?

rewards.reward: LIMITED OFFER! Get the $10 reward + your name in the credits! (Part of the $25 reward) Your name will be listed on Lincoln5.com as a contributor with a link to your website. You will also get a free download of the PC /Mac version when the game is released. Thank you! This is a great deal, since the PC/MAC download version will cost more than $10; you also get your name in the special thanks in the game itself!

Your name will be listed on Lincoln5.com as a contributor with a link to your website. You will also get a free download of the PC /Mac version when the game is released. Thank you! This is a great deal, since the PC/MAC download version will cost more than $10.

Your name will be in the special thanks of the credits in the game itself. You also will get a free download of both the iTouch version AND the PC/Mac version when the game is officially released. Plus the previous reward from $10

You will get first online access to each page of the Lincoln V Comic/Manga \u201cThe Arrival\u201d. You also get access to the beta of Lincoln 5 before the game is officially released. You also get a free t-shirt. Plus previous rewards from: $25 and $10
You will get your free PC/Mac download before the game is officially released. You also get the physical box set for free before the release date. Plus previous rewards from: $35, $25 and $10

You will get a limited edition figurine, modeled after something in the game. If we make it to Priority II of funding, you will have the option between several characters, the Gateway, and possibly more. Your name will be listed in the very special thanks of the game credits. Plus previous rewards from: $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will get a free copy of the physical soundtrack once the game is released. Your name will be listed in the very special thanks of the game credits. You also get a free Lincoln 5 T-Shirt and the official concept art booklet. Plus previous rewards from: $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will get to be a corpse in the game! You will send us your photo or a drawing of a character you\u2019d like to be a corpse, and we will model it and put in the game. You will be credited as a corpse. Please see the \u201cLincoln 5 Kickstarter Rewards Details\u201d link for more information.  Plus previous rewards from: $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will get a limited edition figurine, modeled after something in the game. If we make it to Priority II of funding, you will have the option between several characters, the Gateway, and possibly more. Plus previous rewards from: $200, $55, $35, $25 and $10

Become a side-character in this game! We will model a character after your likeness, and may even give you some speaking lines. You will also get a Signed Limited Launch Edition, a gold invitation to Lincoln V events, you\u2019ll be listed in the special thanks of J.R. Creative Studios next game, and you\u2019ll also get an advanced preview of the next game we make before the public. Please see the \u201cLincoln 5 Kickstarter Rewards Details\u201d link for more information. You also get previous rewards from: $400, $200, $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will get the option between: A) Having your ad on a wall in the game. B) Your product in the game. If your product is something you make, we\u2019ll make a 3D model of it and the player may even be able to interact with it. If it\u2019s something else, like music for example, the player will find a radio to listen to it on in the game. C) We will bundle your product/demo/video/ad with the game. Please see the \u201cLincoln 5 Kickstarter Rewards Details\u201d link for more information. You also get previous rewards from: $400, $200, $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will be credited as a producer in the game. Plus you get a limited edition engraved and signed iPod Touch, a signed limited launch edition, a gold invitation to Lincoln V events, you\u2019ll be listed in the special thanks of J.R. Creative Studios next 2 games, and you\u2019ll also get an advanced preview of the next game we make before the public. (see \u201cLincoln 5 Kickstarter Rewards Details\u201d). You also get rewards from: $400, $200, $55, $35, $25 and $10

You will be credited as an executive producer in the game. You have the option to have a splash screen as the game is starting. Plus you get a limited edition engraved and signed iPod Touch, a signed limited launch edition, a gold invitation to Lincoln V events, you\u2019ll be listed in the special thanks of J.R. Creative Studios next 3 games, and you\u2019ll also get an advanced preview of the next game we make before the public. (see \u201cLincoln 5 Kickstarter Rewards Details\u201d). You also get rewards from: $400, $200, $55, $35, $25 and $10
